hotel_name: L'Aurore Berbère, hypercentre de Rouen, au calme
description:
Situated in Rouen, 600 metres from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite, 3.7 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall and 4.3 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen, L'Aurore Berbère, hypercentre de Rouen, au calme features accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The property is located 4.8 km from Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen, 5.6 km from 14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen and 7.8 km from Rouen Expo. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Musee des Beaux-Arts de Rouen is 400 metres from the apartment, while Flaubert bridge is 4 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 84 km away.

hotel_name: Ambiance Jungle et Cocon en hyper centre pour 2, 4 ou 6 pers - MyLittleStay
description:
Ambiance Jungle et Cocon en hyper centre pour 2, 4 ou 6 pers - MyLittleStay provides accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Rouen, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The property features inner courtyard views and is less than 1 km from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite and a 13-minute walk from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen. Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall is 4 km from the apartment and Voltaire Station, Rouen is 4.4 km away.

At the apartment complex, all units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes a seating area.

Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen is 5.2 km from the apartment, while 14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen is 6 km away. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 83 km from the property.

Ideally located in Saint Malo, L'AccrocheCoeur offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This 4-star guest house offers full-day security and a concierge service. Guests can enjoy city views.

The units in the guest house are fitted with a coffee machine and an iPad. Guests can have fruits delivered to their room. All units feature a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Bon Secours Beach, Mole Beach and Eventail Beach.

hotel_name: Haven of peace near the beaches in Saint-Malo
description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Haven of peace near the beaches in Saint-Malo is an accommodation set in Saint Malo, just 500 metres from Bon Secours Beach and 600 metres from Sillon Beach. The property is located 1.1 km from National Fort, 2.5 km from Solidor Tower and 9.3 km from Port-Breton Park. The property is 400 metres from Eventail Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Grand Bé, Palais du Grand Large and Casino Barrière Saint-Malo.

hotel_name: ibis Styles Strasbourg Stade de la Meinau
description:
Set in Strasbourg, the ibis Styles Strasbourg Stade de la Meinau is a 24-hour reception hotel with a fitness centre and a restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at ibis Styles Strasbourg Stade de la Meinau have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a walk-in shower. A flat-screen TV with Canal+ and BeIn sport channels is provided.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. The 24-hour bar serves snacks and light meals at an extra cost everyday.

The hotel is situated by the tramway which leads to the train station and a 10-minute drive from the centre of the city. Petite France and the Cathedral of Our Lady of Strasbourg are within 4 km of the hotel. There is a private car park on site, available at a surcharge. The Strasbourg Entzeim airport is 18 km away while Europa Park is 55 km away from the hotel.

Featuring free bikes, garden and views of garden, Romantic Studio Vacances is situated in Labaroche, 15 km from House of the Heads. This apartment features free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Barbecue facilities are provided.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 16 km from the apartment, while Colmar Expo is 16 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 74 km away.

In the Sillon district of Saint Malo, close to Eventail Beach, Le Grand Sillon features a terrace and a washing machine. Featuring free private parking, the 3-star apartment is a few steps from Sillon Beach. Outdoor seating is also available at the apartment.

Providing a balcony with sea views, this apartment also provides guests with a TV, a well-equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, as well as 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near Le Grand Sillon include Bon Secours Beach, Palais du Grand Large and Casino Barrière Saint-Malo.

The Hôtel de la Cité is located in the heart of Saint-Malo, just 350 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access and rooms with sea views.

The traditional guest rooms all have  safes, and are all served by a lift. Each has a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer.

The Hôtel de la Cité is in close proximity to many restaurants and popular tourist sites, such as the City of Corsaires. You can also choose to dine at the restaurant in a nearby partner hotel, which offers a panoramic view.

This stylish air-conditioned hotel is located in the West of Paris, 400 metres from the Arc de Triomphe. It offers modern rooms, decorated with warm colours.

The rooms at Star Champs-Elysées are also equipped with satellite TV, a telephone. The private bathrooms feature a hairdryer and either a shower or a bathtub.

A full buffet breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the guest rooms. You can relax in the hotel’s lounge, which features a medieval décor and period fireplace.

Star Champs Elysées welcomes you 24/7 with multilingual staff. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel, and there is a laundry service.

Hotel Star Champs-Elysées is 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro and RER Station, which provide direct access to Disneyland, La Defense, The Louvre Museum and the Montmartre district. The famous Avenue des Champs-Elysées is less than 10 minutes away on foot.

The hotel offers 3 types of breakfast every morning :

The full buffet breakfast, served in our breakfast room at 23€ per day and per person.
The breakfast served directly in your room, at 19€ per day and per person (this is the formula proposed for our bed and breakfast rates).
The express breakfast which can be taken away, at 9€ per day and per person.

hotel_name: l'Exotique - Vue Place du Vieux Marché
description:
Set in Rouen, l'Exotique - Vue Place du Vieux Marché offers city views and free WiFi, 1.1 km from Gare de Rouen Rive Droite and 2.9 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall. The property is situated 3.5 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen, 4.5 km from Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen and 5.3 km from 14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 500 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen.

This apartment includes 1 bedroom, a living room and a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Rouen Expo is 7 km from the apartment, while Musee des Beaux-Arts de Rouen is 600 metres from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 85 km away.

hotel_name: The Originals City, Hôtel Colmar Gare
description:
The Originals Access, Hôtel Colmar Gare is situated between the town centre of Colmar and the railway station in the beautiful Alsace region of France.

All guest rooms are comfortable, soundproofed and equipped with standard amenities including telephone and a TV with satellite channels.

The Originals Access, Hôtel Colmar Gare also has a pleasant dining area where a delicious breakfast is served. Also, there is a 24-hour reception hosted by a multilingual staff (French, English and German).

In the surrounding area guests can enjoy the many alpine ski trails and the beauty of Vosges that are located less than an hour from the hotel.

Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a patio, Gîte De Charme is situated in Colmar. Featuring private check-in and check-out, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The holiday home features a children's playground, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The holiday home with a terrace and garden views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area. The holiday home offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

The area is popular for skiing and cycling, and bike hire is available at this 3-star holiday home. If you would like to discover the area, fishing, hiking and walking tours are possible in the surroundings and the holiday home can arrange a car rental service.

Popular points of interest near Gîte De Charme include Colmar Train Station, House of the Heads and Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km from the property.

hotel_name: i-love-colmar - Le 8 de Coeur - Garage gratuit
description:
Well situated in the centre of Colmar, the recently renovated i-love-colmar - Le 8 de Coeur - Garage gratuit offers well-equipped accommodation featuring air conditioning, free WiFi and flat-screen TV. With free private parking, the property is 500 metres from House of the Heads and 300 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from Colmar Train Station.

Featuring a Blu-ray player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Colmar, like hiking and pub crawls.

Colmar Expo is 3.4 km from i-love-colmar - Le 8 de Coeur - Garage gratuit, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 28 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km from the property.

Les Appartements Saint-Martin offers accommodation within 50 metres of the centre of Colmar, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with a seating area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Martin Collegiate Church, House of the Heads and Colmar Train Station. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km away.

It is situated 3.5 km from Colmar Expo and offers luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Colmar Train Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 28 km from the apartment, while Parc Expo Mulhouse is 42 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 56 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

All rooms have a flat-screen TV and a safe. They also include a private bathroom with a hairdryer, a bath or a shower.

You can enjoy relaxing in the hotel’s lounge and reading room. There is also a tourist information and free WiFi access.

Colmar Train Station is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Colmar Airport, 5 km from Saint-Martin.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance. Skiing, cycling and hiking are possible within the area, and the apartment offers ski storage space.

Colmar Expo is 4.2 km from Klipfel Little Venice, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 31 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km away.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 46 km from the apartment.

The units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All units are fitted with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, while selected rooms include a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a microwave. At the bed and breakfast, all units have bed linen and towels.

A bicycle rental service is available at the bed and breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Chambres d'hôtes Chez Caroline include House of the Heads, Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and Colmar Train Station. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 56 km away.

Gites Du Ladhof has garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Colmar, 1.5 km from House of the Heads. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Skiing, snorkelling and walking tours are possible within the area, and the apartment offers ski storage space.

Located in front of the airport, this Campanile Colmar offers rooms with free WiFi and a restaurant. Colmar city centre is 4 km away.

With a garden view, each room at Campanile Colmar has a private bathroom with hairdryer, tea and coffee making facilities and an LCD TV. Guests can enjoy Canal+ and beIN SPORTS channels, both in the room and in the hotel lounge.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and can also be taken on the hotel's terrace. A regional cuisine is proposed at the restaurant, which also features children's menus; breakfast price for children from 5 years old to 12 years is EUR 5.95 and Children from 13 years old to 17 years old is EUR 10.90.

With a 24-hour reception, Campanile Colmar also offers an equipped meeting room. For your convenience, free private parking is available on site.

Set just off the banks of Lake Annecy, this hotel is 1.5 km from the centre of town.

The rooms at Hôtel Catalpa include an LCD TV with satellite channels. They also provide free toiletries in the en-suite bathroom.

You can enjoy the continental breakfast in your guest room or in the hotel’s dining room.

You can also park your car in the hotel’s private parking with an extra cost and upon prior reservation.

Annecy Casino is 300 meters away, and a public beach is 300 metres away from the property.

A traditional restaurant is available for lunch and dinner on Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturday and Sundays for lunch only

hotel_name: #HI Le petit Marcel Hyper-centre fully equipped
description:
#HI Le petit Marcel Hyper-centre fully equipped is located in Grenoble, 800 metres from Grenoble Train Station, 1.1 km from WTC Grenoble, as well as 5.2 km from AlpExpo. The property is around 2.2 km from Alps Stadium, 4.7 km from The Bastille Grenoble and 5.4 km from Summum. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Col de Parménie is 33 km from the apartment. Alpes–Isère Airport is 46 km away.

hotel_name: La loge parisienne 300m gare Bastille Téléphérique
description:
Offering city views, La loge parisienne 300m gare Bastille Téléphérique is an accommodation set in Grenoble, 800 metres from WTC Grenoble and 5.4 km from AlpExpo. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 500 metres from Grenoble Train Station.

The recently renovated apartment features 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Alps Stadium is 2.3 km from the apartment, while The Bastille Grenoble is 1.8 km from the property. Alpes–Isère Airport is 46 km away.

Located in the centre of Grenoble, ibis Grenoble Centre offers a 24-hour reception bar and free Wi-Fi access throughout. Victor Hugo Tramway is situated outside the hotel and the Bastille Cable Car is 500 metres away.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a wardrobe, a desk and a telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Additional features include luggage storage, daily newspapers and an elevator. Victor Hugo Square is 100 metres away and private parking is possible on site.

Set in the centre of Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo and 37 km from Bourget Lake, HIMALAYA Annecy Rent Lodge offers free WiFi, a casino and air conditioning. The property is around 42 km from Stade de Genève, 46 km from Jet d'Eau and 46 km from St. Pierre Cathedral. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and parking on-site.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Gare de Cornavin is 46 km from the apartment, while Halle Olympique d'Albertville is 47 km away. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 43 km from the property.

description:

The property is around 45 km from St. Pierre Cathedral, 45 km from Gare de Cornavin and 47 km from United Nations Geneva. The property is a few steps from the city centre and 36 km from Rochexpo.

Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

PalExpo is 47 km from the apartment, while Halle Olympique d'Albertville is 48 km away. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 41 km from the property.

Situated in the centre of Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo and 37 km from Bourget Lake, CARPATES Annecy Rent Lodge offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is around 42 km from Stade de Genève, 46 km from Jet d'Eau and 46 km from St. Pierre Cathedral. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and parking on-site.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Gare de Cornavin is 46 km from the apartment, while Halle Olympique d'Albertville is 47 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 43 km away.

B&B HOTEL Annecy Cran-Gevrier is situated in Annecy, within 35 km of Rochexpo and 36 km of Bourget Lake. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk. All rooms in B&B HOTEL Annecy Cran-Gevrier are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Stade de Genève is 41 km from B&B HOTEL Annecy Cran-Gevrier, while Jet d'Eau is 44 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 41 km away.

hotel_name: Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf
description:
The Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf is located 3 km from Lake Annecy and 1 km from Annecy’s historic centre. It provides access to La Clusaz and Grand-Bornand ski resorts, 45 minutes away by car.

Ideal for both short-term and longer stays, these comfortable apartments include free WiFi and modern amenities. A buffet breakfast is available from Monday to Friday at an additional cost.

The Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf is located in Cran Gevrier and is near to shops, restaurants and local transport services.

Annecy Train Station is a 15-minute walk away and parking is available for an additional charge. Semnoz Ski Resort is a 30-minute drive away.

hotel_name: Le Splendid Hotel Lac D'Annecy - Handwritten Collection
description:
The property is facing the lake of Annecy and located in the centre of the old town of Annecy, a couple of paces of the shopping streets. We are also close to the cinemas, theatre and the best restaurants.

The rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

You will find us on the banks of the Vassé canal, facing the lawn of Champ de Mars, next to the Pier for the lake tour in boat and beach at 200 metres. A fitness room is available.

Located in the heart of the French Alps, Impérial Palace is a 4-star hotel is on the edge of Lake Annecy, 1.6 km from Annecy's centre. It offers air-conditioned accommodation, a spa and a casino. Free WiFi is provided.

Each guest room at L'Imperial Palace has a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Most rooms also have a balcony with a view of the lake and surrounding mountains or park. A courtesy tray with tea is available in each room.

The hotel’s gastronomic restaurant, La Voile, provides traditional French cuisine. Meals are served on a shaded terrace overlooking the lake. L'Impérial Palace also has a a more casual restaurant called La Brasserie, a bar, and a lounge where guests can enjoy homemade pastries, snacks and a full buffet breakfast.

The onsite 600 m² spa includes a swimming pool, an experience shower, a sauna, a hammam, an ice fountain, a spa bath and private treatment rooms. Impérial Palace offers also offers a business centre.

Free parking is available on site. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property. Geneva International Airport is 40 km away and Annecy Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. Annecy Château is 2 km away.

Campanile Annecy - Cran Gevrier is 3 km from the city centre, the lake and Annecy train station. Annecy-Methet airport is 5 km away.

It offers rooms with free WiFi,  an electric kettle and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Some rooms can accommodate people with reduced mobility. Free private parking is available.

Guests can enjoy Haute Savoie including Lake Annecy, Gorges du Fier, Le Château de Montrottier. Guests can also visit the Alps: La Clusaz, Le Grand Bornand, Chamonix. Geneva is 30 minutes away.

The on-site restaurant is open Monday to Thursday evening for dinner and Monday to Friday noon for lunch. It serves traditional and family cuisine.

Other facilities at Campanile Annecy include air conditioning and a terrace.

Novotel Annecy Centre is located in central Annecy, a 5-minute walk from the old town, the lake and the Château d'Annecy. It offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.

All guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels including beIN Sports and Canal +. They offer a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. They feature a seating area and the private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Novotel Annecy Centre offers a buffet breakfast. Various dining options including European and French dishes are available at The Craic, the in-house restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a drink and light snacks in the hotel bar.

Novotel Annecy Centre also has an indoor play area and a library for children. Bike rental is available.

Annecy TGV Train Station is just 50 metres from the hotel and Lake Annecy is 1 km away. A private garage is available on site for an extra charge.

Featuring 4-star accommodation, Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy is set in Annecy, 2.1 km from Palais de l Ile and 2.2 km from Chateau d'Annecy. The property is close to several noted attractions, around 1.7 km from Bridge of Love and around 1.8 km from Bonlieu Performing Arts Centre. The property is close to popular attractions like Annecy School of Art, Annecy Town Hall and Annecy Court House.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The hotel features a restaurant open for lunch and diner with a terrace facing the Lake of Annecy.

The property boasts an indoor swimming pool, with sauna, hammam, hot tub and fitness room with free access. Spa massages and yoga session are available at an extra cost.

Guests can find 2 private parking on site (indoor and outdoor) available at an extra cost.

Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French.

Annecy Court House is 2 km from Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy, while Church of St. Francis is 2.1 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 37 km away.

Offering a fitness centre, Aparthotel Adagio Annecy Centre features studios and apartments with free WiFi in central Annecy. It is located 1 km from Lake Annecy, a 3-minute walk from the train station and it has a 24-hour reception.

Each air-conditioned apartment is equipped with a TV with satellite channels. All accommodation feature a seating area and have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All apartments have a kitchen equipped with a microwave, a fridge and a kettle.

A full buffet breakfast is provided every morning at an additional cost.

With paid private parking on site, the residence is just 500 metres from the castle and the old town. Seynod Theatre is 5 km away.

Rooms at the the Novotel Dijon Sud are spacious, air-conditioned and feature a Satellite TV and a mini bar.

Guests can enjoy a drink and sample traditional French cuisine in the Novotel Restaurant. In the summertime, meals are also served on the outdoor terrace. A children’s menu is available upon request.

All rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a laptop and and a desk. Other facilities include a wardrobe, heating and air conditioning. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Some rooms can accommodate disabled guests, other rooms are able to accommodate smokers.

Buffet breakfast is available every morning at an extra charge.

The hotel is 6.5 km from Dijon Train Station. The property is also a 8-minute drive from Dijon Congrexpo Convention Centre. The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 51 km from the property.

Located in Dijon, 700 metres from Saint-Philibert Church and 1.5 km from Dijon Congrexpo, Les Bons Enfants provides accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The property features city views and is 1.2 km from Foch-Gare Tramway Station and 3.7 km from Universite Tramway Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.2 km from Dijon Train Station.

Featuring a DVD player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a hot tub and a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

For guests with children, the apartment offers a baby safety gate.

izivia electric charging stations for all vehicles are available

If you are traveling with pets, please contact the establishment directly to inquire about the pet policies. It is essential to contact the establishment.

You will be accommodated in one of our 41 rooms situated across various buildings as follows:

• The Main Building with elevator access, where we have 21 rooms.
• The Annex, also in the main building, without elevator access.
• The Hotel Pavilion, where we have 9 rooms, without an elevator.
• The Workshop, with 2 spacious rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a kettle, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a well-fitted kitchen in some of the units equipped with a dishwasher and oven. At the aparthotel, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available. At Citadines Eurometropole Strasbourg, the restaurant is open for dinner, lunch and cocktails and specialises in French cuisine.

The area is popular for cycling and hiking, and bike hire is available at this 4-star aparthotel. Walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

St. Paul's Church is 5.5 km from the accommodation, while Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 6 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 13 km away.

This hotel is located in central Strasbourg, a 5-minute walk from the TGV train station and from Petite-France. It offers a wooden deck terrace and soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

Guest rooms at the Grillon Hotel are individually decorated. They each have a TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a shower.

A breakfast buffet is served daily in the Grillon's dining room. The terrace also provides tables and chairs. In the evening you can enjoy a drink at the hotel bar.

The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception. A bicycle rental service is available on request. Place Kleber as well as the Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art are 700 metres away.

Situated conveniently in the Quartier Européen - Orangerie district of Strasbourg, AC Hotel by Marriott Strasbourg is set 100 metres from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre, 700 metres from European Parliament and 1.8 km from St. Paul's Church. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy French dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe. The units in AC Hotel by Marriott Strasbourg are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

The breakfast offers buffet, American or vegetarian options.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 2.5 km from the accommodation, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 2.6 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 13 km from the property.

Located in Strasbourg, Adonis Hôtel Strasbourg offers guest rooms with a modern or baroque décor and free Wi-Fi access. It is 2.4 km from Strasbourg Cathedral and 20 km from Strasbourg-Entzheim International Airport.

All of the rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge, with an additional cost. There is a restaurant 200 metres from the hotel.

Public parking is possible near the hotel at an extra cost and A35 Motorway is 1.4 km away.

Situated in Strasbourg, near Strasbourg Exhibition Centre, European Parliament and St. Paul's Church, Residence Inn by Marriott Strasbourg features a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel has facilities for disabled guests.

The aparthotel has a flat-screen TV. The kitchen features a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster, as well as coffee machine and kettle. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, American and vegetarian options.

Guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 2.5 km from the aparthotel, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 2.6 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 13 km away.

hotel_name: Unforgettable Stay in the Heart of Paris
description:
Set in Paris, 600 metres from Sainte-Chapelle and 1.4 km from Orsay Museum, Unforgettable Stay in the Heart of Paris provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property has city views and is 1.9 km from Musée de l'Orangerie and less than 1 km from Louvre Museum. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and less than 1 km from Luxembourg Gardens.

The apartment consists of 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Notre Dame Cathedral, Tuileries Garden and Pompidou Centre. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from Unforgettable Stay in the Heart of Paris.

The France Albion is a 24-hour reception hotel with free WiFi and luggage storage. It is located a 10-minute walk from the Galeries Lafayettes Shopping Centre and from Opera Garnier.

All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe and wardrobe. The en-suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and amenities.

A buffet breakfast is available daily in the cellar.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Notre-Dame-de-Lorette metro Station which provides direct access to the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum.

hotel_name: Hôtel Ginette à la Folie & SPA
description:
Situated in Paris and with Pompidou Centre reachable within 1.6 km, Hôtel Ginette à la Folie & SPA features a terrace, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a spa and wellness centre. The hotel provides an indoor pool, sauna and room service.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle.

Guests at Hôtel Ginette à la Folie & SPA can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the reception.

Gare de l'Est is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Gare du Nord is 2.1 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 18 km away.

Situated just 500 metres from Place de la République, 9Hotel Republique offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. There is also and a fitness centre and guests can benefit from a 24-hour front desk at the property.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and seating area. Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower, complimentary toiletries and a hairdryer.

Breakfast in available in the dining room or in guests' rooms. Restaurants are in walking distance from the hotel and guests can have a drink at the hotel's bar. Additional facilities include a business centre for guests' convenience.

Nearby attractions include the Pompidou Centre and Park Buttes Chaumont which are both 20 minutes' walk from 9Hotel Republique. Paris Orly Airport is 19 km from the property.

The Garden Saint Martin is located next to Paris’s Canal Saint-Martin. It is just 1.5km from Gare du Nord and offers free WiFi internet access.

The Garden Saint Martin offers rooms with a TV and a private bathroom. Some guest rooms also have a view of the hotel's patio.

A continental breakfast is served daily and the Garden Saint Martin also provides a 24-hour reception.

The Garden Hotel is located a 5-minute walk from Republique Metro Station which provides direct access to the Opera Garnier, Place de la Concorde and the Champs-Elysées.

Paris Italie is ideally located for sightseeing in Paris. It is close to the Latin Quarter, the famous Rue Mouffetard and the Butte aux Cailles. It offers free Wi-Fi access.

Each air-conditioned rooms at the Paris Italie includes a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

This property has a 24-hour front desk service and it is situated next to Italie 2 shopping centre.

Its central location allows for easy access to all of the city's sought-after tourist destinations whether on foot or using public transport such as, Place d’Italie Metro Station, which is 120 metres from Paris Italie. AccorHotels Arena is located 1.9 km from the property.

WS Opéra - Duphot features accommodation within 1.2 km of the centre of Paris, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. Popular points of interest nearby include Musée de l'Orangerie, Tuileries Garden and Orsay Museum. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

Fitted with a balcony, the units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Kitchenware is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy a continental breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

Popular points of interest near WS Opéra - Duphot include Opéra Garnier, Louvre Museum and Gare Saint-Lazare. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly, 18 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

This Best Western hotel is located 10 minutes from Montparnasse Train Station and the Montparnasse Tower. Free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV feature in the air-conditioned guest rooms.

A mini-fridge and tea and coffee making facilities are included in each room. All of the rooms have a classic décor and include a hairdryer in the private bathroom.

Enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning in the breakfast room at Bretagne Montparnasse hotel.

Pernety Metro station is 300 metres away, providing direct access to the Champs Elysées. Orly Airport is just a 13-minute drive from the hotel.

Situated in central Paris near Place de la République and with an art deco façade, Hôtel Gabriel Paris features room service, a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk.

With an uncluttered Zen atmosphere and contemporary decor, this luxurious boutique hotel offers a private and elegant setting to create a quiet sense of relaxation.

Guest rooms are stylishly decorated and equipped with modern en suite facilities including a flat-screen TV, an iPod dock and free, unlimited Wi-Fi access. Rooms are also equipped with a Night Cove digital sleep aide.

The bar lounge captures a surrealist decor.

République Metro Station is just 350 metres away, providing direct access to the Opéra Garnier.

Set in Paris, 4.1 km from Paris-Gare-de-Lyon and 4.7 km from Pompidou Centre, Chambre proche centre et monuments offers air conditioning. The property is located 4.9 km from Notre Dame Cathedral, 5 km from Gare de l'Est and 5.2 km from Sainte-Chapelle. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Opéra Bastille is 2.9 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Gare du Nord is 5.3 km from Chambre proche centre et monuments, while Luxembourg Gardens is 5.6 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 18 km away.

hotel_name: Vintage Paris Gare du Nord by Hiphophostels
description:
Set in the 9th district, this air-conditioned hotel is located just 500 metres from Gare du Nord Train Station and a 15-minute walk from the Moulin Rouge. Vintage Hostel Gare du Nord has a 24-hour reception and offers free WiFi.

Each guest room has a private bathroom and feature a LCD TV. A free fitness room is at your disposal on site.

Anvers Metro Station is 250 metres away, providing direct access to the Arc de Triomphe. Saint-Pierre fabric market is just 450 metres from the hotel and the Sacré-Coeur Basilique is a 10-minute walk away.

hotel_name: Hôtel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille
description:
Situated just 300 metres from Gare de Lyon TGV Train, RER and Metro Stations in central Paris, this air-conditioned hotel offers a 24-hour reception and ticket service. The soundproofed rooms are equipped with free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned guest room features a flat-screen TV and a desk. All of the rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning while reading the newspapers provided. A vending machine selling drinks is located at reception.

Hôtel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille is located just 500 metres from the banks of the River Seine. The trendy nightlife of Bastille is a 10-minute walk away. Public parking is available nearby.

Breakfast is served in the breakfast room on the ground floor from 7am to 10.30 am. An "express" breakfast formula including 1 hot drink, 1 fruit juice and 2 viennoiseries is also available (to request to the hotel).

Midway between the Latin Quarter and Bibliothèque François Mitterrand, this Citadines Austerlitz Paris is a 3-minute walk from the Campo Formio Métro station. It is a 10-minute walk from Gare d'Austerlitz.

Citadines Apart'hôtel Austerlitz features 50 apartments, including studios and a 2-room apartment. They all have a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom.

The spacious and luminous breakfast room looks out onto the garden where the terrace is set in the summertime.

The Citadines Apart'hôtel offers a business centre with free Wi-Fi access, a laundry room and on-site car park with spaces subject to availability. Place d'Italie and Jardin des Plantes are both a 10-minute walk away.

This hotel is located in Paris’s Bastille district, 100 metres from the Gare de Lyon, in a quiet street. It offers rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and private bathrooms.

Guests of the Hotel Du Midi can relax in the TV room or the lounge, which have internet access.

Additional services include a 24-hour reception.

Maison Traversière is a few minutes’ walk from the Bastille, Opera Bastille, the Seine and the Place des Vosges.

Located on the left bank in central Paris, this hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower and the departure point of the Bateaux Mouches cruise boats. It has a 24-hour reception and a lounge with a computer and marble flooring.

The air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a mini fridge, cable TV and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has a bathroom including a hairdryer at hotel Beaugrenelle.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the spacious breakfast room at Beaugrenelle Tour Eiffel. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar while reading the newspapers provided.

Dupleix Metro Station is 240 metres away, providing access to the Arc de Triomphe and the famous Champs Elysées, the Eiffel Tower and Montparnasse Railway Station.

Located opposite Gare du Nord Train Station, this hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The Sacre-Coeur and the Montmartre district of the city are a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

Each soundproofed guest room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. All rooms at Hotel Flanelles Paris offer an en suite bathroom with a shower and hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. Additional services offered include a 24-hour reception desk and a luggage storage room.

The hotel is located 1 km from Canal Saint-Martin and 1.5 km from Place de la République. Gare du Nord Metro Station offers direct access to Notre-Dame Cathedral.

hotel_name: Beaux 2-pièces Gare du Nord/Gare de l'Est
description:
Beaux 2-pièces Gare du Nord/Gare de l'Est is located in the 10th arr. District of Paris, 1.6 km from La Cigale Concert Hall, 700 metres from Gare de l'Est and 1.7 km from Pigalle Metro Station. During your time staying in this recently renovated apartment, dating back to 1958, you will have access to free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Gare du Nord.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Sacré-Coeur is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Pompidou Centre is 3.4 km from the property. Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport is 20 km away.

Set in the heart of Opéra, just a few minutes from a chic shopping area including the famous Galeries Lafayette, the theatres district and lively Montmartre. This hotel offers free Wi-Fi.

Each air-conditioned rooms at the New Hotel Opéra have displays of unique artwork which are painted by a local artist. They also feature a private bathroom and satellite on a flat-screen TV. The roof-top room has wooden floors with views over Paris.

Newhotel has facilities such as a 24-hour front desk, an elevator that gives access to all rooms and a terrace with a garden that guests can enjoy breakfast on during the summer.

New Hotel Opéra is located in a calm street near the Casino de Paris and Sacré Cœur. It is 140 metres to Metro Station Liege and 750 metres to Metro Station Saint-Lazare, so guests can discover the rest of Paris.

In an 18th-century building in the historic 6th district, this elegant hotel (25 rooms) offers air conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. Odéon Metro Station is 800 ft away.

Satellite TV and a minibar are available in each soundproofed room. Guest rooms have a romantic décor with pastel colors. Some rooms feature a view of Rue de Buci. Enjoy a continental breakfast every morning in the vaulted cellar at Le Regent.

After breakfast, guests can relax in the lounge, which has marble floors and antique furnishings. With a 24-hour front desk, hotel Le Regent provides a tour desk and a ticket service. Notre Dame Cathedral is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel and Eugène-Delacroix Museum is 1000 ft away. An airport shuttle service is available upon request

Providing free WiFi throughout the property, HOTEL FORMIO is situated in Paris, 2.2 km from Luxembourg Gardens and 2.8 km from Sainte-Chapelle. The property is around 2.9 km from Notre Dame Cathedral, 2.9 km from Opéra Bastille and 4.4 km from Pompidou Centre. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Paris-Gare-de-Lyon.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at HOTEL FORMIO also offer a city view. Guest rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available daily at HOTEL FORMIO.

Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Rodin Museum is 4.6 km from the hotel, while Orsay Museum is 4.6 km away. Paris - Orly Airport is 13 km from the property.

Located 500 metres from Place de la Nation in Paris, the hotel District Nation is a non-smoking property offering a 24-hour reception and luggage storage.

All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. District Nation features free WiFi throughout the property.

Continental breakfast can be enjoyed at an extra cost.

Bastille lively district is 20 minute away by walk and Pere Lachaise can also be reached within 20 minute. Guests can easily reach the Champs Elysées within 20 minutes by public transport. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18.5 km from the property.

Well set in the 15th arr. District of Paris, Sublim by Sweett is located 1.6 km from Rodin Museum, 2.4 km from Orsay Museum and 2.4 km from Eiffel Tower. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. Tuileries Garden is 3.3 km from the hotel and Sainte-Chapelle is 3.4 km away.

At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries, all units at Sublim by Sweett have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a balcony. All rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine.

Luxembourg Gardens is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while Musée de l'Orangerie is 2.9 km away. Paris - Orly Airport is 14 km from the property.

Hôtel Vacances Bleues Provinces Opera is located in the lively neighborhood of the Grands Boulevards, next to the theatres and 300 metres from Grand Rex cinema. The Grévin Museum is 650 metres away while Opéra Garnier is 1.6 km away.

The hotel has air-conditioned rooms, a Grand Salon and meeting rooms.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning.

The Pompidou Centre is 1.7 km from Hôtel Vacances Bleues Provinces Opera and famous shops such as the Galeries Lafayette can be found 1.4 km away.

Located just 2.4 km from Plage des Fours à Chaux, Malouinière Guillaume Onffroy provides accommodation in Saint Malo with access to a garden, a shared lounge, as well as a shared kitchen. The property features garden views and is 2.8 km from Plage du Rosais and 3 km from Bas-Sablons Beach. Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 5 km away and National Fort is 5.1 km from the bed and breakfast.

Featuring a private bathroom, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi, while some rooms here will provide you with a terrace.

A continental breakfast is available at the property and includes fresh pastries and juice.

Solidor Tower is 4.7 km from the bed and breakfast, while Palais du Grand Large is 4.9 km away. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 74 km from the property.

Le Sunset Malouin features a balcony and is located in Saint Malo, within just 1.7 km of Eventail Beach and 1.9 km of Rochebonne Beach. It is situated 1.5 km from Palais du Grand Large and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 800 metres from Sillon Beach.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with free toiletries. Offering free private parking, this 2-star apartment also features free WiFi.

Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 1.5 km from the apartment, while National Fort is 1.7 km away.

hotel_name: APPARTEMENT NEUF ET BIEN SITUE AVEC UN CLASSEMENT
description:
Located in Saint Malo, near Sillon Beach, Eventail Beach and Bas-Sablons Beach, APPARTEMENT NEUF ET BIEN SITUE AVEC UN CLASSEMENT has a terrace. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. The apartment features facilities for disabled guests.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palais du Grand Large, Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and National Fort.

Hotel Ajoncs d'Or is located in the heart of the historic fortified city walls of Saint Malo, 350 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers individually decorated rooms, which feature original artwork and free Wi-Fi access.

Each soundproofed room has a private bathroom and satellite TV. Rooms are accessible by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the spacious bright dining room. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Ajoncs d'Or hotel bar.

The hotel is conveniently placed to make the most of St Malo's many famous restaurants. In the summer, Saint Malo is a lively seaside resort featuring numerous outdoor and beach activities. Gare de Saint-Malo Train station is 1.8 km away. Private parking is available for an additional fee and must be reserved in advance.

Hotel Elizabeth, situated in the historic Ship Owners district inside the walls of Saint-Malo offers an atmosphere of yesterday with the modern comforts of today. Saint-Malo Marina is 180 metres away.

Guestrooms are distributed among 2 buildings, Les Armateurs, which includes the superior rooms and Les Skippers, 50 metres away, with the standard rooms. The former was built in the early 17th century and the latter is a more modern building. All rooms are comfortable and equipped with modern en suite facilities.

Free Wi-Fi internet in the entire property. In the stone-walled cellar, enjoy your breakfast under 400 year old exposed wooden beams.

In the vicinity of Hotel Elizabeth you will find the 18th-century House of Pirates, Saint Servan, the city of Aleth, and the museum of Cap Horniers. You can also enjoy a walk on the ramparts and the beach of Sillon.

hotel_name: Chez Léon - Appt à 500m des plages
description:
Set 300 metres from Bon Secours Beach and 500 metres from Eventail Beach in the centre of Saint Malo, Chez Léon - Appt à 500m des plages offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. It is located 400 metres from Grand Bé and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 500 metres from Mole Beach.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palais du Grand Large, Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and National Fort.

Located just 150 metres from the beach in Saint-Malo, Hotel De La Mer offers free WiFi access throughout and an on-site bar. The train station is only a 10-minute walk away.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and heating. Each room has a private bathroom that includes a bath and free toiletries.

In July and August, a continental breakfast is available each morning at Hotel De La Mer. From September to June, it is served from Tuesday to Saturday. Restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the hotel.

Saint-Malo Port is 2 km away and Espace Duguay Trouin Convention Centre is 1.1 km from the property. Naye Ferry Terminal is 2.4 km away.

The Hotel de France and Chateaubriand is located in the heart of the historic city of Saint Malo, 210 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers breathtaking views over the sea and le sillon.

The Hotel de France and Chateaubriand offer comfortable rooms with a refined decoration.

The restaurant serves many traditional seafood and regional specialties.

Its unique façade to Saint Malo, and the presence of the birthplace of Chateaubriand make the building to be classified a historical monument.

T2 Confort Sillon St Malo is a beachfront property situated in Saint Malo, 700 metres from Sillon Beach and 1.4 km from Rochebonne Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is soundproof and is located 2 km from Eventail Beach.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 2 bathrooms with free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Palais du Grand Large is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 1.9 km from the property.

Le Courtoisville Apartment has a terrace and is set in Saint Malo, within just 800 metres of Rochebonne Beach and 1.6 km of Minihic Beach. The property is around 1.9 km from Palais du Grand Large, 2 km from Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and 2.2 km from National Fort. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sillon Beach is 300 metres away.

The spacious apartment has 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Grand Bé is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Solidor Tower is 5 km from the property.

Hotel Bristol Union is located in the heart of Saint Malo, within the city walls of the old town and 180 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. Its rooms and suites are en suite with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

A daily breakfast service is available. It is served in the dining area or in the comfort of your guest room. The bar offers a nice place to enjoy a quiet drink or evening aperitif.

The Bristol Union benefits from a convenient location for those wishing to explore and discover Saint-Malo and the picturesque region of Brittany. Mont Saint Michel is just a 45-minute drive from the hotel.

The Oceania Saint Malo hotel faces the sea and is located on Chaussée du Sillon, opposite Sillon Beach and 450 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers luxurious rooms and guests have free access to spa area and swimming pool.

Guest rooms are air-conditioned and feature parquet flooring. They include flat-screen TV, free WiFi and a spacious bathroom.

The terrace has a panoramic sea view. The open-air hot tub is located on the patio. The modern fitness room includes the latest exercise equipment and massages are offered at an extra cost.

The lounge bar in the Oceania Saint Malo offers a variety of cocktails and drinks and can accommodate private cocktail parties. It also offers a dining menu for evening meals. Breakfast is served daily.

The Oceania is 1.5 km from the Saint-Malo Train Station and 7 km from the airport. On-site parking is available. English, Spanish, German and French are spoken at reception.

hotel_name: Nice 34m near the Port of Saint-Malo
description:
Offering city views, Nice 34m near the Port of Saint-Malo is an accommodation located in Saint Malo, 1.8 km from Bas-Sablons Beach and 1.3 km from Palais du Grand Large. It is situated 1.3 km from Eventail Beach and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1 km from Sillon Beach.

The apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casino Barrière Saint-Malo, National Fort and Grand Bé.

Located in Saint Malo, just 1.3 km from Plage des Fours à Chaux, Grand Studio Bord de Mer provides beachfront accommodation with free WiFi. It is situated 2.1 km from Mole Beach and features free shuttle service. The property is 100 metres from Bas-Sablons Beach, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

The apartment includes 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom with a shower, a seating area, and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Solidor Tower is 400 metres from Grand Studio Bord de Mer, while Grand Bé is 2.5 km away.

Sweet Apartment is located in Saint Malo, 2.5 km from Minihic Beach, 2.7 km from Palais du Grand Large, and 2.7 km from Casino Barrière Saint-Malo. It is situated 1.8 km from Rochebonne Beach and features bicycle parking. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sillon Beach is 1.3 km away.

The apartment with a terrace and quiet street views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. This apartment also comes with a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy a continental breakfast.

National Fort is 2.9 km from Sweet Apartment, while Grand Bé is 3.5 km from the property.

Nestled within the fortified walls of Saint-Malo, Hotel Cartier Intra-muros resides at the very heart of the city, offering easy access to its vibrant surroundings. Just 280 metres from Saint-Malo Marina and a mere 500 metres from the beach and the English Channel, our hotel boasts a modern décor and air-conditioned guest rooms equipped with complimentary internet access.
Each room features flat-screen TVs for your entertainment. With en suite bathrooms and plush carpet flooring, our guest rooms offer the ultimate in comfort and relaxation, fully renovated to meet your needs.
Indulge in a buffet-style breakfast each morning, served in our inviting breakfast area or the privacy of your own room.
Conveniently located, Saint-Malo Cathedral is a mere 120 metres away, while the Saint-Malo Train Station is just a 5-minute drive from our doorstep.
While our central location ensures easy exploration of the city, we understand that it also means exposure to its lively activities. Rest assured, all windows at Hotel Cartier Intramuros are equipped with double glazing to minimise any potential disturbances. While we cannot guarantee complete silence, we strive to provide a peaceful retreat for our guests.

Ideally located in Saint Malo, Hôtel San Pedro offers an à la carte breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is close to Grand Bé, Palais du Grand Large and Casino Barrière Saint-Malo. Private parking is available on site.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, some units at Hôtel San Pedro also have a city view.

The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and free use of bicycles is available at this 2-star hotel.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Bon Secours Beach, Mole Beach and Eventail Beach.

On the Grand Place in Old Lille, Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place is set in a building of Flemish architecture and the rooms offer a marble bathroom and antique furniture. Welcome to The People Le Havre!

Here, you can meet, sleep, have a drink and even work, in the heart of the most arty city in Normandy.

Solo, with friends or family, we have everything you need: enjoy our 4 to 6 person dormitories or 2 to 4 person studios.

Enjoy the view, share a board and dance the night away from our Rooftop Bar.

Bring out your best ideas in our The People Work spaces.

The People Le Havre is waiting for you, the opportunity to take a breath of fresh air for a few days!

description:

each gite has a living room with fully-equipped kitchen, reversible air-conditioning and a private terrace.

 all rentals have access to a large garden, under a pinede, with a swimming pool open from mid-May to the end of september, with ping-pong table, children's games, on site it will be possible to make various ballads on the paths of the mas to discover the fauna and flora of camargue, and during the summer period you can participate in our camarguaises days in cart pulled with our gardians, a unique experience to discover our breeding of camargue bulls.

Property Description
Set in a building dating from the 15th century, La Villa Mazarin is located in the fortified city of Aigues-Mortes. It offers a terrace and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The guest rooms have air conditioning, heating, satellite TV, a telephone and a fridge. All rooms are furnished in 17th-century Provençale style.

In the hotel's restaurant, La Table, you can enjoy French culinary specialties or choose from a selection of light meals and snacks. The salon opens onto the courtyard and sun terrace. The restaurant is open in the evenings from Wednesday to Sunday from 7pm to 9pm, and only at weekends for lunch (noon to 1pm).
Closed on Mondays and Tuesdays.

The Villa Mazarin has a private underground car park 1.85 m high.
This option, which costs €18 per day per vehicle, must be booked in advance (subject to availability, as the number of spaces is limited).

Your pet (dog or cat) is welcome (ON RESERVATION - one pet per room - supplement of €25 per day applies). Please contact us beforehand.

Our relaxation area is available until midnight (sauna, steam room, fitness room, swimming pool heated between 23° and 26°).
